Source   Edit  

Note: Unless both 2D and 3D methods/elements are provided, assume it is for 3D PGA.

Basis Vectors

  • 2D PGA $\quad e_1,~ e_2,~ e_0,~ e_{01},~ e_{20},~ e_{12},~ e_{012}$
  • 3D PGA $\quad e_1,~ e_2,~ e_3,~ e_0,~ e_{01},~ e_{02},~ e_{03},~ e_{23},~ e_{31},~ e_{12},~ e_{023},~ e_{031},~ e_{012},~ e_{321},~ e_{0123}$

PGA Elements

ElementEquivalentGradeEquation
Scalar / AntiscalarMagnitude0 / 4$$\mathbf{z} = x\mathbf{1} + yùüô \\ \text{or} \\ \quad\mathbf{z} = x + ye_{0123}$$
VectorPoint1$$\mathbf{p} = p_xe_1 + p_ye_2 + p_ze_3 + p_we_0$$
BivectorLine2$$\begin{aligned}\mathbf{l} &= l_v + l_m \\ \mathbf{l} &= l_{vx}e_{01} + l_{vy}e_{02} + l_{vz}e_{03} + \\ &\qquad l_{mx}e_{23} + l_{my}e_{31} + l_{mz}e_{12}\end{aligned}$$
TrivectorPlane3$$\mathbf{g} = g_xe_{023} + g_ye_{031} + g_ze_{012} + g_we_{321}$$
MotorDual QuaternionN/a$$\begin{aligned}\mathbf{Q} &= Q_v + Q_m \\ \mathbf{Q} &= Q_{vx}e_{01} + Q_{vy}e_{02} + Q_{vz}e_{03} + Q_{vw}e_{0123} + \\ &\qquad Q_{mx}e_{23} + Q_{my}e_{31} + Q_{mz}e_{12} + Q_{mw}e_{0123}\end{aligned}$$
FlectorReflection OperatorN/a$$\begin{aligned}\mathbf{F} &= F_p + F_g \\ \mathbf{F} &= F_{px}e_1 + F_{py}e_2 + F_{pz}e_3 + F_{pw}e_0 + \\ &\qquad F_{gx}e_{023} + F_{gy}e_{031} + F_{gz}e_{012} + F_{gw}e_{321}\end{aligned}$$

Symbols Used

SymbolMeaningFunctionsOperatorsMeaning
‚àßWedge / Exterior product / Joinwedge`‚àß`
‚à®Antiwedge / Exterior antiproduct / Meetantiwedge`‚à®`
‚óèBulkbulkThe real/non-$e_0$ parts of the element
‚óãWeightweightThe extent of the element into the 4th dimension (i.e., those including $e_0$)
‚òÖBulk dualbulk_dual`‚òÖ`
‚òÜWeight dualweight_dual`‚òÖ~`

List of Useful Expressions

ExpressionInterpretation
g ‚à® lConstruct a point where g and l intersect
p ‚àß qConstruct a line from p to q
g ‚à® hConstruct a line where g and h intersect
p ‚àß g‚òÜConstruct a line through p orthogonal to `g
l ‚àß pConstruct a plane containing l and p
p ‚àß l‚òÜConstruct a plane containing p and orthogonal to l
l ‚àß g‚òÜConstruct a plane containing l and orthogonal to g
g ‚à® (p ‚àß g‚òÜ)Orthogonally project p onto g
l ‚à® (p ‚àß l‚òÜ)Orthogonally project p onto l
g ‚à® (l ‚àß g‚òÜ)Orthogonally project l onto g
g ‚à® (p ‚àß g‚òÖ)Centrally project p onto g
l ‚à® (p ‚àß l‚òÖ)Centrally project p onto l
g ‚à® (l ‚àß g‚òÖ)Centrally project l onto g

$l = p \wedge q$ Source   Edit   
func wedge(p, q: Vec3): Bivec2D {.inline, ...raises: [], tags: [], forbids: [].}
$$
\begin{aligned}
p \wedge q &= (p_xe_1 + p_ye_2 + p_we_0) \wedge (q_xe_1 + q_ye_2 + q_we_0) \\
           &= p_xq_xe_1e_1 + p_xq_ye_1e_2 + p_xq_we_1e_0 + \\
      &\qquad p_yq_xe_2e_1 + p_yq_ye_2e_2 + p_yq_we_2e_0 + \\
      &\qquad p_wq_xe_0e_1 + p_wq_ye_0e_2 + p_wq_we_0e_0 \\
           &= p_xq_ye_{12} + p_xq_we_{10} + p_yq_xe_{21} + p_yq_we_{20} + p_wq_xe_{01} + p_wq_ye_{02} \\
           &= (p_wq_x - p_xq_w)e_{01} + (p_yq_w - p_wq_y)e_{20} + (p_xq_y - p_yq_x)e_{12}
\end{aligned}
$$
Source   Edit   
func wedge(p, q: Vec4): Bivec3D {.inline, ...raises: [], tags: [], forbids: [].}
$$
\begin{aligned}
p \wedge q &= (p_xe_1 + p_ye_2 + p_ze_3 + p_we_0) \wedge (q_xe_1 + q_ye_2 + q_ze_3 + q_we_0) \\
           &= p_xe_1q_xe_1 + p_xe_1q_ye_2 + p_xe_1q_ze_3 + p_xe_1q_we_0 + \\
      &\qquad p_ye_2q_xe_1 + p_ye_2q_ye_2 + p_ye_2q_ze_3 + p_ye_2q_we_0 + \\
      &\qquad p_ze_3q_xe_1 + p_ze_3q_ye_2 + p_ze_3q_ze_3 + p_ze_3q_we_0 + \\
      &\qquad p_we_0q_xe_1 + p_we_0q_ye_2 + p_we_0q_ze_3 + p_we_0q_we_0 \\
           &= p_xq_x + p_xq_ye_{12} + p_xq_ze_{13} + p_xq_we_{10} + \\
      &\qquad p_yq_xe_{21} + p_yq_y + p_yq_ze_{23} + p_yq_we_{20} + \\
      &\qquad p_zq_xe_{31} + p_zq_ye_{32} + p_zq_z + p_zq_we_{30} + \\
      &\qquad p_wq_xe_{01} + p_wq_ye_{02} + p_wq_ze_{03} \\
           &= (p_yq_z - p_zq_y)e_{23} + (p_zq_x - p_xq_z)e_{31} + (p_xq_y - p_yq_x)e_{12} + \\
      &\qquad (p_wq_x - p_xq_w)e_{01} + (p_wq_y - p_yq_w)e_{02} + (p_wq_z - p_zq_w)e_{03} + \\
      &\qquad p_xq_x + p_yq_y + p_zq_z
\end{aligned}
$$
Source   Edit
